text:
Just a friendly reminder: 

Vitamins C, B6, and E👍🏾
(among others)

Zinc is good too, but don't overdo it.

Citrus, Ginger, Garlic, Spinach, Yogurt, Bell Peppers, Papaya, Broccoli, Almonds, Sunflower Seeds, Kiwi, Turmeric, Green Tea, (poultry/shellfish if you eat it), avocados
